newsHeadlines.headline: El documental sobre Ralph Lauren desnuda a un ícono de la moda
newsHeadlines.summary: Este martes 26, HBO emitirá "Very Ralph", un material que cuenta secretos de un diseñador exquisito y exitoso. Cuenta cómo un chico del Bronx pudo generar, con los años, un imperio millonario.

newsHeadlines.headline: Here's Why You Must Retain Ralph Lauren (RL) in Your Portfolio
newsHeadlines.summary: Ralph Lauren's (RL) strong international business and efforts to expand the digital ecosystem bode well. Softness in North America and disruptions in Hong Kong hurt its performance.

newsHeadlines.headline: TJX Beats Expectations With Third Quarter Results
newsHeadlines.summary: The owner of Marshalls, TJ Maxx and Home Goods, TJX Cos Inc (NYSE: TJX ) raised its full year profit on Tuesday as sales soared before the holidays! TJX attracts price-conscious shoppers of luxury brands like Calvin Klein, Ralph Lauren (NYSE: RL ) and many others sought after brands, offering them at discounts of up to 60%. The Framingham, Massachusetts-based company has been slowly expanding with new store openings and even remodelling of existing ones. As a result of its successful strategy, its shares rose 1.4% before the opening bell. Third Quarter Earnings Report With a 4% rise in comparable-store sales, the company already beat the 2.3% Refinitiv estimate and it didn't stop there. Net income rose from $762.3 million in last year's quarter to $828.3 million, respectively from 61 cents per share to 68 cents per share. On average, analyst's expected net sales of $10.32 billion resulting in profit of 66 cents per share whereas the company's net sales increased 6% and rose to $10.45 billion.

newsHeadlines.headline: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) Coverage Initiated at Barclays
newsHeadlines.summary: Analysts at Barclays began coverage on shares of Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) in a report released on Tuesday, MarketBeat reports. newsHeadlines.summary: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) had its price objective boosted by Piper Jaffray Companies from $91.00 to $102.00 in a research report released on Friday, Stock Target Advisor reports. newsHeadlines.headline: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) Shares Up 14.7% Following Earnings Beat
newsHeadlines.summary: Ralph Lauren Corp (NYSE:RL)’s share price shot up 14.7% on Thursday following a stronger than expected earnings report. The company traded as high as $116.12 and last traded at $115.67, 5,707,643 shares traded hands during mid-day trading. An increase of 411% from the average session volume of 1,116,308 shares. newsHeadlines.headline: Ralph Lauren's Q2 Earnings Preview
newsHeadlines.summary: Ralph Lauren (NYSE: RL ) releases its next round of earnings this Thursday, November 7. Get the latest predictions in Benzinga's essential guide to the company's Q2 earnings report. Earnings and Revenue Based on management's projections, Ralph Lauren analysts model for earnings of $2.39 per share on sales of $1.69 billion. In the same quarter last year, Ralph Lauren reported earnings per share of $2.26 on revenue of $1.69 billion. Sales would be down 0.06% from the year-ago period. newsHeadlines.headline: Factors Setting the Tone for Ralph Lauren's (RL) Q2 Earnings
newsHeadlines.summary: Ralph Lauren's (RL) strategic initiatives as well as strength in International and digital businesses are likely to get reflected in second-quarter fiscal 2020 results.

newsHeadlines.headline: Can Ralph Lauren's Growth Strategies Cushion the Stock?
newsHeadlines.summary: Ralph Lauren (RL) is grappling with headwinds related to the North America segment's digital business and currency. However, its strategies like the 'Next Great Chapter' plan are likely to offset headwinds.
